doc.name: printTextSize
doc.summary: Has no effect and is included in LiveCode for compatibility with imported HyperCard stacks.

description.p: In HyperCard, the printTextSize property specifies the font size of printed text. In LiveCode, only cards can be printed, and the size of text on the card is determined by the textSize property of the objects that display text..
By default, the value of printTextSize is 14. A handler can set the property, but the new setting has no effect.
